title: Ridiculous Drawers
prompt: Create an absurdly over-engineered single HTML page with a ridiculous amount of sliding panels, elastic sidebars, and tabs. Panels on all four edges, nested drawers, tabs within tabs, collapsible sections everywhere. Everything should have smooth elastic/bouncy animations. Make it functional chaos - every panel and tab should actually work. The more ridiculous the better. Dark theme. Self-contained HTML file.
note: Swarm battle: 3x Opus (9x cost) vs 3x Sonnet (3x cost) vs 3x Haiku (1x cost)
